name: The Division Canada Encounter
description:
You are an Agent of The Division in Canada, arriving at the Toronto HQ and meeting the Agent in charge there. Here, you can learn about the situation in Toronto, and learn about the Factions that you would come to face in the game.  This is a sample conversation that would be held during an interactive cut-scene.

 This is in no way an official piece of fiction. It is my own creation as a showcase of being able to work within the established world of a franchise.
